LOGIN_gappsText: Log in using your school mail:
HOME_materialInfo: Here you will see how many material you have in your possesion. Material will be reserved if it is used in a project that's in the queue. If you abort a project you will regain the material.
DASHBOARD_breakInfo: Why do you want to cancel the print task?
DASHBOARD_beingPrinted: There is a print in progress
DASHBOARD_notBeingPrinted: There are currently no prints in progress
PRINTSADD_formCuraProfilePrototype: Prototype - shorter time duration, cheaper - relatively sturdy
PRINTSADD_formCuraProflieExtraStrong: Extra sturdy - longer time duration, more expansive
PRINTSADD_popupInfo: Your project is currently being processed. A moment please.
CURAPOPOVER_profile: These are pre-made profiles to quickly choose a setting for your project.
CURAPOPOVER_layerHeight: The Layer Height indicates how thick in Milimeters the lower and upper layers will be. A lower Layer Height will give more precision but will also take longer to print and will be more expensive.
CURAPOPOVER_shellThickness: The Shell Thickness indicates in Milimeters how thick the walls of the print object are. Thicker walls are stronger but are more expensive in material and take more time.
CURAPOPOVER_bottumTopThickness: The Bottom Top Thickness indicates how thick the upper and lower layer will be. Depending on how often the Layer height fits inside the Bottom Top Thickness will decide howmany layers there will be on the bottom and top of the printed object.
CURAPOPOVER_fillDensity: The Fill density is the percentage in which a object is being filled. Higher fill density is stronger but also costs more material and takes longer to print.
CURAPOPOVER_printSpeed: This is the speed in which a printer will work in Miliseonds. A higher speed means a shorter speed but less precise.
CURAPOPOVER_supportType: This indicates what kind of support will be build for your object so you can print at angles off more than 45 degrees. Touching Buildplate: Build a support under the object but not between the object itself. Everywhere: It will build a support everywhere in and around the object.
PRINTITEM_infoStatusNotcommitedDesc: Your project is currently not submitted yet.
PRINTITEM_infoStatusAcceptedDesc: Your project has been approved and has been placed in the queue to be printed.
PRINTITEM_infoStatusPrintingDesc: Your project is currently being printed
PRINTITEM_infoStatusFailedDesc: Something went wrong while printing your project, our appologies.
PRINTITEM_popupProcessingDesc: Your project in currently being processed, a moment please.
